name: Limelight VR
description:
Limelight puts you on stage in front of a virtual crowd. Practise giving a presentation in a business meeting, small classroom or a large hall.

Key Features:

  • Room scale VR
  • Different high fidelity environments
  • Interactable objects like microphones and markers
  • Variable crowd levels
  • Changable mood of the audience
  • Access to Google Slides
